analysis.description:
H2CToken.refundTokens (/unique_chucks/33/0x49c8fd724747d6806437b070159fae5e3510c027.sol#365-376) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(_refund,_value) (/unique_chucks/33/0x49c8fd724747d6806437b070159fae5e3510c027.sol#371-373)
Token.totalSupply (/unique_chucks/33/0x49c8fd724747d6806437b070159fae5e3510c027.sol#56-57) should be declared external
H2CToken.totalSupply (/unique_chucks/33/0x49c8fd724747d6806437b070159fae5e3510c027.sol#236-237) should be declared external
Token.balanceOf (/unique_chucks/33/0x49c8fd724747d6806437b070159fae5e3510c027.sol#57-58) should be declared external
AbstractToken.balanceOf (/unique_chucks/33/0x49c8fd724747d6806437b070159fae5e3510c027.sol#88-93) should be declared external
H2CToken.createTokens (/unique_chucks/33/0x49c8fd724747d6806437b070159fae5e3510c027.sol#296-322) should be declared external
H2CToken.setOwner (/unique_chucks/33/0x49c8fd724747d6806437b070159fae5e3510c027.sol#330-336) should be declared external
H2CToken.freezeTransfers (/unique_chucks/33/0x49c8fd724747d6806437b070159fae5e3510c027.sol#342-349) should be declared external
H2CToken.unfreezeTransfers (/unique_chucks/33/0x49c8fd724747d6806437b070159fae5e3510c027.sol#350-351) should be declared external
H2CToken.refundTokens (/unique_chucks/33/0x49c8fd724747d6806437b070159fae5e3510c027.sol#365-376) should be declared external
H2CToken.freezeAccount (/unique_chucks/33/0x49c8fd724747d6806437b070159fae5e3510c027.sol#382-396) should be declared external

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/33/0x49c8fd724747d6806437b070159fae5e3510c027.sol:
